page.title: 06Employment in our Area
page.content: Most of the people in and around Conon and Maryburgh work outside the two villages.Most of the people work in places like Dingwall,Inverness and Nigg.In the whole of the population of Maryburgh fourteen people work in the village its self.In our area there are three major employers.The Conon Cold Store,Conon Hotel and the Riverbank Nursery in Conon.The Nursery sells all sorts of plants aswell as trees.In Conon there is a Butcher, two Hairdressers ,a Newsagents ,a petrol station ,a Post Office ,a Grocers shop ,a Building Society ,a Dress shop and a Fish and Chip shop.In Maryburgh there are only two little shops which have about three people in each shop. There are two schools ,one in Maryburgh and one in Conon.There are six teachers in Maryburgh and seven teachers in Conon.
